messages.content: It's been a huge privilege to have served as the Member of Parliament for Newcastle North since 2010. I'm determined to continue working to get the best deal for you and hope to be honoured to be re-elected to represent you.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for local jobs and investment in our area
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for better transport links to create more jobs and bring investment to the North East.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Standing up for our NHS and social care services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reversing privatisation and increasing investment in the NHS and social care to reduce waiting times and support our elderly and vulnerable.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting education funding from Tory cuts
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring that schools in Newcastle have the funding they need to provide our children with the best possible education.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Striving for a fairer economy that works for everyone
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working to grow our economy that sees people paid a fair day’s wage for a hard day's work.

issues.economy: Striving for a fairer economy that works for everyone. An economy that leaves too many behind: 3,000 people in Newcastle remain unemployed or trapped in low-paid work.
issues.education: Protecting education funding from Tory cuts. Ensuring that schools in Newcastle have the funding they need to provide our children with the best possible education.
issues.health: Standing up for our NHS and social care services. Reversing privatisation and increasing investment in the NHS and social care to reduce waiting times and support our elderly and vulnerable. Our NHS at a breaking point: GP and hospital services are under intense pressure.
issues.labourEmployment: Fighting for local jobs and investment in our area. Campaigning for better transport links to create more jobs and bring investment to the North East.
issues.transport: Fighting for local jobs and investment in our area. Campaigning for better transport links to create more jobs and bring investment to the North East.
